vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μεγᾰλ-ωστί [ῐ],
adverb of μέγας, far and wide, over a vast space, κεῖτο μέγας μ. [Refs 8th c.BC+]
__II variant for{μεγάλως}, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 ={μεγαλοπρεπῶς}, [Refs 5th c.BC+] — Epic dialect, _Ionic dialect_, and late Prose.
vocabInfos.shortDef: far and wide, over a vast space
vocabInfos.mediumDef: far and wide, over a vast space
vocabInfos.stepGloss: far and wide, over a vast space
